identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a modern, elegant, and emotionally impactful NGO website.

theme.visual_style: Clean, Minimalist, with bold color accents

headings.usage: Main headings (H1, H2, H3). Use tight tracking for large sizes.

body.usage: Body text, buttons, navigation, small labels.

accent.name: Action Magenta
accent.usage: Urgent CTAs (Donate), heart icons, emotional accents

grid_system.projects: Bento Grid: Mix of col-span-1 and col-span-2 items. Use aspect-square for some, aspect-video for others.
grid_system.team: Grid of cards: grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-8

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-semibold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-primary border-2 border-primary hover:bg-primary/5 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-semibold transition-all duration-300
buttons.donate: bg-accent text-white hover:bg-accent/90 rounded-full px-10 py-4 text-xl font-bold shadow-xl hover:shadow-2xl hover:-translate-y-1 transition-all duration-300 animate-pulse-slow

cards.style: bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-300 border border-gray-100 overflow-hidden

inputs.style: rounded-xl border-gray-200 focus:border-primary focus:ring-primary/20 bg-gray-50 focus:bg-white transition-all duration-200

visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle mesh gradients in backgrounds using the brand colors at 5-10% opacity.

animations.scroll: Use 'framer-motion' for scroll-triggered fade-ins and slide-ups.
animations.hover: Scale up images slightly on hover (scale-105).
animations.micro: Buttons should have active scale down (active:scale-95).

hero.alt: Diverse group of happy volunteers hiking together
hero.description: Main hero image showing community and joy.

education.description: For the 'Education for All' project card.

volunteers.description: For the 'Join Us' or Volunteer section.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'We Care Foundation' website using React and Tailwind CSS.
Use the provided color palette strictly. Do not use default Tailwind colors.
Use 'Playfair Display' for all headings and 'Manrope' for body text. Import them from Google Fonts.
Create a sticky header with glassmorphism effect.
The 'Donate' button in the header must be prominent (Accent color).
Build a 'Bento Grid' for the Projects section.
Ensure the 'Donate Now' section is high-impact with pre-selected amount buttons ($10, $25, $50, $100).
Use 'framer-motion' for smooth entrance animations as the user scrolls.
Do not implement real payment processing, just the UI.
Ensure the site is fully responsive (mobile-first).
Use the provided image URLs for their respective sections.
Add a 'data-testid' to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry where possible.
Ensure high contrast for text readability.
Add hover states to all interactive elements.
